data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: You get this message when you tap on your current theme
data.expected_result: You shouldn't get this message unless you actually switch themes
data.short_description: If you tap on your current theme, you get a message saying "Theme has been updated."
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Appearance - Tap on your current theme (Light/Dark) and notice that you get a toast message saying "Theme has been updated."
